mapper.insert: insert into member_log (id, uid, action, ip_address, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{action,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{ipAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, uid, action, ip_address, create_time from member_log
